item.title: arXiv: optimising hadronic collider simulations using amplitude neural networks
item.description: The preprint for my ACAT 2021 proceedings contribution, Optimising hadronic collider simulations using amplitude neural networks, appeared on arXiv today (InspireHEP). This follows my recent talk. It is also available through the GitLab CI system here (source).

item.title: ACAT 2021 talk: optimising simulations for diphoton production at hadron colliders using amplitude neural networks
item.description: I gave a virtual talk at ACAT 2021 (while I had COVID, actually) about our recent paper. Here are the slides (source) and a recording (below). Apologies for where the audio cuts out in the middle, but it’s really Zoom’s fault for not supporting Linux well.
